name: Platformer Prototype (dudefro3600)
description:
Short prototype for a momentum based platformer.

"For every action there is an equal and opposite reaction". This includes every shot you take with your gun - your potentially overpowered gun.

Explore the level to find upgrades to your gun, and let the recoil from each shot help propel you to new heights.

What I learned from this project: Level design is difficult
